repo.subject: Mega Project
repo.description: Under the institution, I along with a team created multiple games that were playable by physically challenged for the upliftment of mood and cognitive improvement and enjoyment. Created a controller in Java that is able to detect movement of the face and expressions, based on which few dedicated games were created in Unity and Python that were controlled by this controller. This was a proprietary project under JIIT.

repo.subject: Perceptron Model
repo.description: This is my personal attempt to create and implement the Perceptron model using C#. This project still has bugs and currently under work.

repo.subject: Community Detection
repo.description: This was a very intriguing project. Basically this was an implementation of community detection algorithm, which is a fairly advanced part of Machine Learning. This project was under research with the supervising professor and a team of two.

repo.subject: Recipebook website
repo.description: A dummy project made during my college times to learn more about deploying project in firebase and using firestore database to fetch and store data.

repo.subject: Mumbai Metro - Interchanges
repo.description: This was a project made by implementing dijkstra algorithm to do basic functions like find shortest route, find fare, distance between Station A to Station B, find interchanges etc. in a replicated mumbai metro layout. This was coded in C++ during my college time.

repo.subject: Game Consoles
repo.description: A few game consoles were created that consisted of several games into one single console program. The consoles and the games in it were created in C++ and Python.

repo.subject: BTech CSE
repo.organisation: Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, Noida
repo.description: I completed my graduation in Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from JIIT, Noida. Securing an overall CGPA of 7.7

repo.subject: Higher Secondary - Engineering
repo.description: I completed my higher secondary graduation in Engineering with Computer Science from St. Joseph's School NTPC Kahalgaon, Bihar. Securing an overall perventage of 96.4%

repo.subject: .NET Developer Trainee
repo.description: I work for the project SorbyLIMS (Laboratory Inventory Management System), which is an in-house LIMS system. My responsibility is to fix bugs and issues, create new features and maintain the application in the Production. Being a part of this project, I work with ASP.Net and SQL.

repo.subject: .NET Developer Intern
repo.description: I was given training and knowledge for the project SorbyLIMS (Laboratory Inventory Management System). My responsibility was in the due course of this period, learn about the application and help seniors with debugging of the issues, providing hands-on knowledge about how the application is actually working.
